metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0497 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: ARM mbed TLS before 2.12.0, before 2.7.5, and before 2.1.14 allows remoteattackers to achieve partial plaintext recovery (for a CBC basedciphersuite) via a timing-based side-channel attack. This vulnerabilityexists because of an incorrect fix (with a wrong SHA-384 calculation) forCVE-2013-0169.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
